nipple.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the small dark circular part of a woman’s breast. Babies suck milk through their mother’s nipples.
nipple.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of the two small dark circular parts on a man’s chest
nipple.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the rubber part on a baby’s bottle that a baby sucks milk through
nipple.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a part in an engine or machine made of rubber or plastic and shaped like a nipple. It has a hole in it which liquid can flow or be poured through.
